What We Do

We create great websites for businesses of all sizes for any industry. We optimise your online advertsing and marketing budget.

Concepting

We help you come up with an online strategy to help bring your business in line with online market trends in order to discover the best tools to help your specific situation. This step allows us to assess how best we can efficiently bring your business into the digital age without breaking the bank. No project is too small and each solution is tailor made.

Development

We use our expertise in all the relevant technologies of the web i.e. HTML5 & CSS3, Javascript as well as CMS & e-commerce solutions to create scalable websites that will meet your needs & those of your customers. All the websites we create will make use of the best & most up to date design practices so that your website is always on the cutting edge.

Google

We will setup your business on all the relevant google platforms like, Google Ads for search Advertising, Google Analytics to help monitor the performance of your website and Google Business in order to make sure that your brand and business are easy to find on the web for anyone who may need the services or goods that you provide. This will also include Search Engine Optimization.

Facebook

With Facebook & other social media sites now taking up a large portion of the time spent online, this is an essential tool for marketing and advertising. We will help set you up on Facebook with a business page & direct your facebook advertising to the right type of customer most likely to spend money on your products or services. As well as help build brand recognition.

Why have a Website?

Having a website for your business or personal brand is now more essential than ever.

1

Identify Your Needs

Before embarking on any project to build a website. You as the customer have to identify what you expect from your website. This way we will be able to build something that suites your needs. This is the first step to building a meaningful website that speaks to what you do.

2

Respnsive Design

Because these days the devices accessing the internet are of different sizes, any website that we build will have to be responsive meaning it will cater to the device you view it on, (smartphone or computer) to allow for a good user experience.

3

Brand Identity

In many cases your website will be one of the first things a potential customer or business partner will look for when making the decision of whether to do business with you. Thus the website should reflect your company or brand personality.

4

Marketing & Advertising

Online Marketing & Advertising will allow your business to find new potential customers & retain exisiting ones. However a constant eye must always be kept on your Return On Investment, & we have the tools & knowledge to help you with that.
